Title: Relates to protecting people from civil arrest while going to, remaining at, or returning from polling places
Summary: Exempts certain people from civil arrest while going to, remaining at, or returning from a polling place.
LawCode: Add ยง29, Civ Rts L; amd ยง4-a, Judy L; amd ยง3-102, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, the judiciary law and the election law, in relation to protecting people from civil arrest while going to, remaining at, or returning from polling places
